snippet: Best latte in the neighborhood! Cozy atmosphere.
Great pastries, friendly staff. A bit crowded on weekends.
Coffee is decent but the wait was too long during morning rush.
The avocado toast is amazing. Will definitely come back!
Nice spot for remote work. Good WiFi and outlets.
Waited 15 minutes for a drip coffee. They need more staff in the morning.
Solid breakfast burrito. Wish they had more lunch options.
My go-to coffee shop. The matcha latte is perfection.
Consistently good quality. Fair prices for the area.
